meta.title: Central Registration to Operate Remotely During COVID-19 Crisis - Kettering City School District

meta.content: Central Registration to Operate Remotely During COVID-19 Crisis

The Kettering City Schools Central Enrollment Department will continue to serve our current and new families remotely as we adhere to mandated school closures and CDC recommendations relative to the COVID-19 crisis.

h1.span: Central Registration to Operate Remotely During COVID-19 Crisis

p.span: The Kettering City Schools Central Enrollment Department will continue to serve our current and new families remotely as we adhere to mandated school closures and CDC recommendations relative to the COVID-19 crisis.
If you are a parent/guardian who needs to withdraw your child from school, please email the following information to KCS's district registrar, Carmella Ford, at carmella.ford@ketteringschools.org:

li.span: Name of student and building student currently attends
Last day of student's planned attendance
Name of new school and/or district

p.span: If you are a parent/guardian who is registering a student for Kindergarten-12th grade who is NEW to the Kettering City Schools, please complete the online 2019-2020 New Student Registration Packet, also found under QUICK LINKS on the home page of the district website.

If you need to register a student for Kindergarten-12th grade who is NEW to the Kettering City Schools for the 2020-2021 school year, please contact KCS's district registrar, Carmella Ford, at carmella.ford@ketteringschools.org

If you need to register your child for Preschool for the 2020-2021 school year, please click on this link to access the online registration packet. Parents/guardians may register children who are 3-5-years-old by August 1, 2020 and are toilet-trained for preschool in the Kettering City Schools.

If you have custody changes that need to be made to your child(ren)'s school file or you have custody related questions, please contact KCS's district registrar, Carmella Ford, at carmella.ford@ketteringschools.org
For all other Central Enrollment-related inquiries, please email KCS's district registrar, Carmella Ford, at carmella.ford@ketteringschools.org
